summary: A musical of sorts set in Winnipeg during the Great Depression, where a beer baroness organizes a contest to find the saddest music in the world. Musicians from around the world descend on the city to try and win the $25,000 prize.
cast: Mark McKinney|Isabella Rossellini|Maria de Medeiros|David Fox|Ross McMillan|Louis Negin|Darcy Fehr|Claude Dorge|Talia Pura|Jeff Sutton|Graeme Valentin|Maggie Nagle|Victor Cowie|Jessica Burleson|Wayne Nicklas|Nancy Jane Drake|David Gillies|Daphne Korol|Adriana O'Neil|Jeff Skinner|Craig Aftanas|Miles Boisselle|Brock MacGregor|Daniel Hawkins|Emile Bisseck|Marol Jal|Binasio Wani|Joshua Stanton|Sharmela Parboji|Alan Parboji|Nalini Reddy|Veena Goel|Aasttha Khajuria|Mohyna Dookun|Lena Shah|Shyamala Dakshinamurti|Usha Sharma|Sunayana Gupta|Jesus Paz Sr.|Jesus Paz Jr.|Isaac Paz|David Paz|Johanna Paz|Richard Escaffi|Daron Baxter|Crystal Hay|Gail Hay|Gwen Court|Sara Leclair|Diane Leclair|Shona Munroe|Catherine Russell|Shannon Baxter|Jessica Locke|Corie Johnston|Shawna Turner|Xiao Nan Wang|Claire Marchand|Jim Shewchuk|Sheila Ghosh|Other Members of the Winnipeg Folk Arts Group|Erik Berg|Matthew J. Kok|Arthur MacKinnon|Adam McCort|Brent Neale|Jessica Smith|Kevin Yeboah
title: The Saddest Music in the World
